model

Class DataIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DataIO

  • public class DataIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class receives live Betfair data and it collects and formats it. Once markets close it then saves its data collections for references. If the program is in test mode then it will run as usual except it won't produce any log files If run in normal mode (testMode is false) then it will run and produce log files
    Author:
    Craig

      • addData

        public void addData(java.util.List<BetfairMarketData> liveMarketData)

      • getRecentlyClosedMarkets

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRecentlyClosedMarkets()
        Get the list of markets that have just closed
        Returns:
        List of markets that have closed in the form of 'market name, time closed' where closing time is the ms from epoch

      • storeCatalogueActivity

        public void storeCatalogueActivity(java.util.List<BetfairMarketData> allMarkets)
        Store the financial activity for all active markets
        Parameters:
        allMarkets - MarketData objects representing active markets

      • getRecentData

        public java.util.List<BetfairMarketItem> getRecentData()
        Get the most recently added probability values for each markets runners
        Returns:
        List of BetFairMarket items for each tracked market containing 1 index of data for each runner inside them with probabilities and timestamps
